content.query:
SELECT
    Borough,count(1) as number_of_trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
        ) AS trip_data
    JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        ) 
        WITH (
            LocationID SMALLINT,
            Borough VARCHAR(15),
            Zone VARCHAR(50),
            service_zone VARCHAR(15)
        )AS [taxi_zone]
ON trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone.LocationID
GROUP by Borough
ORDER by 1
